metadata.title: CVE-2024-50158 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/bnxt_re: Fix out of bound checkDriver exports pacing stats only on GenP5 and P7 adapters. But whileparsing the pacing stats, driver has a check for "rdev->dbr_pacing".  Thiscaused a trace when KASAN is enabled.BUG: KASAN: slab-out-of-bounds in bnxt_re_get_hw_stats+0x2b6a/0x2e00[bnxt_re]Write of size 8 at addr ffff8885942a6340 by task modprobe/4809

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50158` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19

No subscription required
